Text: Important Note: Opens with Foxit Reader fine. Adobe Reader 9 had problems opening it.

Yes i tried to solve that too, but he came before me ;)

Nevertheless - for interested, there is made a documentary on this topic (Perelman) and shown on one of the science channels.

I can't recall exatly channel but it would be great if that was to dowload (haven't checked when writing this).

The math problem was actually about the dimensional world we live in and how it's constructed (hard to explain).

After solving this mystery, he actually isolated himself from the science society. I guess that i would do too, after being so close to god's scerets.
zappaz you are a living encyclopaedia. :) Thank you for your lively comments.
